content.verses:
[
    [0] {
      order: 1
      type: verse
      hawaiian_text: 
      | E kuʻu belle o ka pō laʻilaʻi
      | Ka lawe mālie a ka mahina
      | Kōaniani mai nei e ke ahe
      | Āhea ʻoe hoʻolono mai
      english_text: 
      | Prince
      | William Pitt Leleiohoku
      hawaiian_lines: [E kuʻu belle o ka pō laʻilaʻi, Ka lawe mālie a ka mahina, Kōaniani mai nei e ke ahe, Āhea ʻoe hoʻolono mai]
      english_lines: [Prince, William Pitt Leleiohoku]
    }
    [1] {
      order: 2
      type: hui
      hawaiian_text: 
      | Āhea ʻoe, āhea ʻoe
      | ʻOe hoʻolono mai
      | I nei leo nahenahe
      | Adios, adios ke aloha
      | E ka hauʻoli ʻiniki puʻuwai
      | E ke aloha e maliu mai ʻoe
      | Ke hoʻolale mai nei e ke Kiu
      | Ua anu ka wao i ka ua
      | Hoʻokahi kiss
      | Dew drops he maʻū ia
      | E ka belle o ka noe līhau
      | Eia au lā e ke aloha
      | Ke huli hoʻi nei me ka neo
      english_text: 
      | Prince
      | William Pitt Leleiohoku
      hawaiian_lines: [Āhea ʻoe, āhea ʻoe, ʻOe hoʻolono mai, I nei leo nahenahe, Adios, adios ke aloha, E ka hauʻoli ʻiniki puʻuwai, E ke aloha e maliu mai ʻoe, Ke hoʻolale mai nei e ke Kiu, Ua anu ka wao i ka ua, Hoʻokahi kiss, Dew drops he maʻū ia, E ka belle o ka noe līhau, Eia au lā e ke aloha, Ke huli hoʻi nei me ka neo]
      english_lines: [Prince, William Pitt Leleiohoku]
      label: Hui:
    }
  ]

metadata.copyright: 1942 Charles E. King Translated by Mary Pukui
